mapper.insert: insert into user(uId, pwd, uName, birth, phone, email, zipCode, address, gender, joinDate, job) values(#{uId}, #{pwd}, #{uName}, #{birth}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{zipCode}, #{address}, #{gender}, #{joinDate}, #{job})
mapper.select: select uId from user where uName = #{uName} and email = #{email}
select uId from user where uName = #{uName} and phone = #{phone}
select uId from user where uId = #{uId} and email = #{email}
